thread.title: All of the very best (and worst) glitzy looks from the Inside Soap Awards red carpet
thread.title_full: All of the very best (and worst) glitzy looks from the Inside Soap Awards red carpet

title: All of the very best (and worst) glitzy looks from the Inside Soap Awards red carpet
text:
All of the very best (and worst) glitzy looks from the Inside Soap Awards red carpet All of the very best (and worst) glitzy looks from the Inside Soap Awards red carpet 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
London has played host to the Inside Soap Awards, welcoming a whole host of sparkling TV stars down the red carpet. 
All the action took place at the West End’s DSTRKT club, where the stars of Emmerdale, Coronation Street and Hollyoaks all struck a pose as they sauntered inside to enjoy the ceremony. 
Here are the fabulous (and not so fabulous) looks straight from the soap-tastic red carpet. 
Hollyoaks starlet Gemma Atkinson set the style bar pretty high with a jumpsuit, heels and a metallic clutch. A loose braided updo completed the look, and she opted for simple, girly make-up and a peachy lip. Gemma Atkinson (Ian West/PA) 
Natalie J Robb looked super cute in this lacy black number, with matching mini black patent handbag. However Natalie ought to throw those shoes into the sea and never retrieve them. Natalie J Robb (Ian West/PA) 
Ex-Emmerdale actress Verity Rushworth looked elegant in this black ballerina-style gown and cute patent pumps. Major style points for the cute brown bob and touch of red lippy. Verity Rushworth (Ian West/PA) 
Has Nikki Sanderson been taking style tips from Jessica Rabbit? The former Coronation Street actress oozed sex appeal in this bodycon red number, complete with big bouncing curls and black strappy sandals. Nikki Sanderson (Ian West/PA) 
Daisy Wood-Davis glowed in a striking emerald green gown with a modest midi hemline, cream clutch and towering heels. Daisy Wood-Davis (Ian West/PA) 
Sadly it looks like Charley Webb didn’t get the red carpet memo. Someone tell the girl she’s going to an awards ceremony, not a night out in Oceana. And burn those shoes. Charley Webb (Joel Ryan/AP) 
It doesn’t matter how jaw-droppingly beautiful you are Jennifer Metcalfe, clothes like this should simply not exist. Jennifer Metcalfe (Ian West/PA) 
Did a dog maul your dress on the way out the door, Gemma Oaten? We can’t think of any other reason for the giant rip in the back of your gown… Gemma Oaten (Ian West/PA) 
Either Tamara Wall just got back from a very tropical holiday or she’s been soaking in a bed of fake tan for days on end. Let’s not even mention that weird Jedward quiff. Share article
